comment: Example input for the Inference Pipeline workflow
description: This configuration is used to start an inference workflow execution via Step Functions. It specifies the transaction batch to score.

notes.transactionBatchPath: S3 path to the daily transaction batch (JSON array of Transaction objects)
notes.batchDate: Date of the transaction batch (used for DynamoDB indexing and metrics tracking)
notes.executionId: Unique identifier for this workflow execution (typically generated by Step Functions)
notes.currentStage: Name of the first stage (ScoreStage for inference pipeline)
notes.previousStage: null for first stage, otherwise name of previous stage
notes.workflowBucket: S3 bucket for workflow orchestration (replace with your account-specific bucket)
